LanguageData.princess.ExtraStats.transmitsPower.desc: Whether this transmits power - i.e. if it's a wire, battery or a generator.
LanguageData.princess.ExtraStats.shortCircuitInRain.d: Whether this can short circuit if left out in the rain.
LanguageData.princess.ExtraStats.basePowerConsumption: How much power this produces. Do note that both vanilla and modded buildings have a habit of misreporting their power production values, so take it with a grain of salt.
LanguageData.princess.ExtraStats.solarPowerOutput.des: How much power this solar panel produces. Do note that both vanilla and modded buildings have a habit of misreporting their power production values, so take it with a grain of salt.
LanguageData.princess.ExtraStats.windPowerOutput.desc: How much power this solar panel produces. Do note that both vanilla and modded buildings have a habit of misreporting their power production values, so take it with a grain of salt.
LanguageData.princess.ExtraStats.storedEnergyMax.desc: How much power this battery can store.
LanguageData.princess.ExtraStats.efficiency.desc: How much power this battery gives back when discharged.
